name: Office Building - Idle Tycoon
description:
So as a landlord in this dog-eat-dog world, how ever could you survive the market?



-Build your very own real estate empire, develop your properties.
-Expand on your territory and build more office buildings!
-Introduce companies, indie developers and more! Start the story here!
-Improve every detail and transform from small to five-star building



Now, time to show your real business and marketing talents! Go for it!
